name: Yandé Codou Sène
description: '''Yandé Codou Sène''' (also ''Yande Codou Sene'') was a [[Senegalese]] singer from the [[Serer people|Serer]] ethnic group. She was born in 1932 at [[Somb]] in the [[Sine-Saloum]] delta and died on July 15, 2010, at [[Gandiaye]] in [[Sénégal]]. She was the official [[griot]] of president [[Léopold Sédar Senghor]]. Most of her music is in the [[Serer language]].
